description: A complete HTML file for a web-based database viewer interface, including styles and embedded JavaScript handling database selection, table display, and data rendering.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and resets the UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database to show tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables within a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for displaying tabular data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for individual cell content, handling objects, long texts, and nulls.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for full viewing.
